title: Cumulative Relative Frequency; MLB Salary
question_text:
The cumulative relative frequency plot below displays one hundred major league baseball players' salaries (in millions) in 1994. The salaries were rounded to the nearest dollar.
Created for Albert.io. Copyright 2017. All rights reserved.

Which of the salary brackets below contains the smallest amount of players?

choices.text: It cannot be determined based on the information given.
